Replying to @sankalped 2018-10-09 11:17
@sankalped @Netlify It doesn't. There is no webserver to perform server-side rendering at request-time. Instead think of @Netlify as a CDN to serve your pre-rendered sites. Includes are typically performed by the templating of a SSG at build time. See https://t.co/8e7Iwrxmwj for leading SSGs
